title: [GAMEPLAY] Orianna range indicator without a ball

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
A couple of minutes in to a game, this yellow range indicator popped up and stayed until the end of the game.
When I had the ball out, there were 2 range indicators as you can see in the picture.

replies.body:
Hi hi! 

Thanks for the solid bug report (images are always helpful), We're currently looking into what's going on here.
Soooo it's been a few patches are they by chance getting a better understanding of the bug orrrrr has it just been super low priority?
I'm actually working with someone tomorrow to dig a bit deeper into the issue.
Awesome! Glad to hear it. Good luck!
Thanks! We have a better idea of what's going on here - it's a matter of nailing down a fix. :P
Glad to hear this. I'm an Orianna main and am getting this bug all the time. It is super tilting and it makes me play a lot worse. I hope to see that you guys are making it a high priority!
This happened to me too, with the same skin on aram. Mine was stuck red and it was so confusing. And I kept the arrow when I had the ball on me.

This happened to me too. Except I have an arrow even when the ball is attach to me. In an ARAM game the indicator was being weird, and I can't even see the ball on me. It would only reappear if I move the ball else where. (Lost the game BTW I was having a hard time keeping track of the ball).
